skills.name: ETERNAL BONDAGE
desc: • Deal random damage to all enemies.
• 35% Chance each to inflict Perfect Blind, Heal Block, Perfect Corruption, and Silence for 2 turns.
• Grant Golden Hit buff to self and random ally for 2 turns.
• Damage dealt increases based on your SPECIAL stat.

skills.name: DELIVERANCE
desc: • Grant Perfect Heal Shield and Golden Trap to all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: HIDDEN HIEROGLYPH
desc: Increase the healing of all allies by +100%. Grants Charge and Golden Hit to allies suffering from Blind or Taunt effects for 2 turns at the start of your turn.
